alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 2:45PM EDT until July 27 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gray Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Cheshire County in southern New Hampshire... Northwestern Hillsborough County in southern New Hampshire... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 245 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Keene, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Keene, Jaffrey, Antrim, Dublin, Harrisville, Nelson, Marlborough, Roxbury, Swanzey, Sullivan, Troy, Hancock, Surry, Chesterfield, Westmoreland, Gilsum and Stoddard. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
